post.description: Login with email and password (JSON format for frontend)

Registro completo de SaaS multi-tenant.

Espera um JSON com:
{
  "name": "",
  "email": "",
  "phone": "",
  "password": "",
  "company_name": "",
  "business_type": "",
  "timezone": "America/Sao_Paulo",
  "currency": "BRL",
  "team_size": "",
  "slug": "",
  "plan_type": "FREE" | "TRIAL",
  "trial_end_date": "",
  "referral_code": "",
  "coupon_code": ""
}

List all companies in the SaaS platform.

Only accessible to SAAS_OWNER or SAAS_STAFF.
This endpoint does NOT filter by company_id (global access).

schema.title: Response List All Companies Api V1 Saas Admin Companies Get

get.description:
Get detailed information about a specific company.

Returns:
- Company basic info
- Subscription status
- Active users count
- Recent activity metrics

put.description:
Update company information.

Allows updating:
- Basic info (name, email, phone, etc.)
- Activation status
- Settings

get.description:
Get SaaS-wide metrics overview.

Returns:
- Total companies
- Active companies
- Companies created in last 30 days
- Total users
- Active users
- MRR (Monthly Recurring Revenue) - if available
- Churn rate - if available

post.description:
Impersonate a company - generate a new JWT token with company scope.

This allows SaaS admins to "enter as" a specific company, accessing
the normal company app with that company's context.

Flow:
1. SaaS admin calls this endpoint with a company_id
2. Backend generates a new JWT with:
   - Same user_id (sub)
   - Same saas_role (preserved)
   - company_id set to the target company
   - company_role set based on CompanyUser or default to COMPANY_OWNER
   - scope set to "company"
3. Frontend receives the new token and redirects to /dashboard

Security:
- Only SAAS_OWNER or SAAS_STAFF can impersonate
- All actions taken while impersonating are logged (if audit log exists)
- The original saas_role is preserved in the token

get.description:

Can filter by company_id or saas_role.

schema.title: Response List All Users Api V1 Saas Admin Users Get

post.description:

UserRole.title: UserRole
UserRole.description:
Legacy UserRole enum - DEPRECATED

This enum is kept for backward compatibility.
New code should use:
- SaaSRole (from app.core.rbac) for global SaaS roles
- CompanyRole (from app.core.rbac) for company roles

Migration path:
- SAAS_ADMIN -> SaaSRole.SAAS_OWNER
- OWNER -> CompanyRole.COMPANY_OWNER
- MANAGER -> CompanyRole.COMPANY_MANAGER
- etc.
